Please find the Monthly Summary Cash Report for the period ending 8/25/22 below:  image962×1350 216 KB  The report is also available on Pinata https://app.pinata.cloud/. CID on Pinata is: QmbNhsqy642bagbBK43zi1i27DnRBjMZNGNAWjV9Cgotxr
Is the 35,000 difference between USD and DAI due to Genesis’ fees or due to conversion not being 1:1? Thanks!
This is two ways of saying the same thing. Either way, it’s value that went to Genesis (~7bps per trade) for their services.

For those wondering, please note that this report is as of August 25, 2022 (as per the agreements). The next report will include the remaining two disbursements which occurred on August 29th and September 6th.
This topic was automatically closed 90 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

Please find the Monthly Summary Cash Report for the period ending October 27, 2022 below:  image873×1818 157 KB  The report is also available on Pinata. CID on Pinata is: QmeQV5jqkaVv3U9vcfNTmPiXrixt6k4sdySbqf7moudh7p.

Hi Ryan, Thanks for the reporting. Could you define what is under loan payment received? Is it interest from the loans? Principal? Both? In case it covers the interest part, what is Amount received from servicer then? For reference, the dashboard based on your data.  image1648×699 48.4 KB

Hi Seb, The $56,383.06 of “Loan Payment Received” into the Participation Receipt Account was both P&I. 100% of this amount was received from the Servicer. We use reporting from WSFS to create the monthly summary cash report, so we’ve asked WSFS if it is possible to break out P&I going forward so we can reflect those details in our reporting going forward. Hope this is helpful.

@InfoAgent Would it be possible to deliver an EXCEL or Google Sheet version of the report as well as the current PDF version? Having an EXCEL or google sheet version would make ingesting the data easier. Thanks
One last question @InfoAgent Do you have an ETA on when should the transaction for yield generated be sent to the RwaJar? I believe once there is yield the agreed payment frequency is monthly.
Can I get more details about the fees line? Also, how do you plan your federal, state, and local tax payments? It may be in other posts, but I haven’t read it.

Unfortunately, there doesn’t seem to be a way to attach Excel files to the forum. If there is, we’d be happy to do it. In the meantime, I’ll reach out to our contacts at Maker to see if there are other solutions.

The distribution of payments is spelled out in Section 3.04 of the Trust Agreement. WSFS confirmed that payments would be made to the Escrow Account from the Participation Receipt Account after items (i) through (vii) of Section 3.04(b) are satisfied. As per WSFS, payments would be made back to Maker from the Escrow Account on a monthly basis as per the Escrow Agreement. It is difficult to project when this will commence as it largely depends on the rate at which participations occur and the size of such participations.

I’ve discussed with GovAlpha on this. We believe the easiest way would be: 1.- Upload PDF to the forum (you are currently doing this. All good) 2.- Upload PDF to pinata.cloud and publish the hash in the forum (you are currently doing this. All good) 3.- Upload an excel version to pinata.cloud and publish the hash in the forum stating that it is the spreadsheet version (New task) 4.- Optional: share a link to a google spreadsheet in the forum (New task, optional). Adding excel capability to the forum would take time and might not be really needed if the above steps are fine with @InfoAgent . If they are, it would be great if you can execute them for the older reports as well so we get the excel version of all those.

M_C - no problem. We’ve gone ahead and uploaded Excel versions of the reports (including the past reports) onto Pinata. We’ll also post Excel versions onto Pinata going forward. We don’t use Google sheets so unfortunately option 4 won’t work. CIDs are: Report for the period ending 8/25/22: QmZjPqdD8Zr1Zp3ttHocG7KybpynSBTYEjV3LJSKPVqb7V Report for the period ending 9/26/22: QmcdafbQQoAnD9HsAGE1oCHm4aV8iePF48815Cg4y2m48P Report for the period ending 10/27/22: QmbpefSLmPFdpFwFYpGNRycWJ7skaJcrC26f2R8bxJPg68 Cheers, InfoAgent
